document.id: Laws of Md., ch. 947 (2024 Session Md. Gen. Assembly)
document.heading: Baltimore City – Control Over Powers of Police Commissioner
An Act Concerning Baltimore City – Control Over Powers of Police Commissioner

section.heading: Police power.
section.text: To have and exercise within the limits of Baltimore City all the power commonly known as the Police Power to the same extent as the State has or could exercise that power within the limits of Baltimore City.
